title: Understanding the Problem
text: To determine the type of analysis needed, consider what you are trying to measure. Sulfur dioxide is a specific compound, so think about whether you need to know its presence or its quantity.

title: Types of Analysis
text: There are different types of analysis in chemistry: qualitative, quantitative, characterization, and fundamental. Which one focuses on measuring the amount of a substance?

title: Choosing the Right Analysis
text: Which analysis type is used to measure sulfur dioxide in factory emissions?
